ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The guards con warm to me...it s the dragoons I have trouble with.  I am told there is a bone quest that will fix that.  I really don t have time tho -- I
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> wrote:

> But I seriously doubt any of us can get around
> safely in Cabilis yet ;)

The guards con warm to me...it's the dragoons I have
trouble with. I am told there is a bone quest that
will fix that. I really don't have time tho -- I have
run with the same group since lvl 4 and haven't wanted
to leave, even to do my Lambent quests...life in
kunark has been good to me tho ... I will leave when I
hit lvl 32 with a blade of fiery lamitations, a
nostrollo tamborine and a few other really cool items
...

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Bard of 31 taunts
